content.user_title: Analyze GDPR compliance and data protection
content.value_statement: Organizations struggle to navigate complex EU GDPR and German DSGVO requirements. This skill provides expert guidance on compliance frameworks, privacy impact assessments, data subject rights management, and regulatory verification.
actual_capabilities: Design and implement GDPR/DSGVO compliance frameworks including legal basis and individual rights
Conduct Data Protection Impact Assessments (DPIA) with risk identification and mitigation
Manage data subject rights requests including access, erasure, and portability
Address German DSGVO specific requirements including BDSG integration and supervisory authority coordination
Prepare for external audits and supervisory authority investigations
Provide guidance on international data transfers under GDPR Chapter V
limitations: Provides guidance and recommendations only, does not replace legal counsel
Cannot access external regulatory databases or real-time legal updates
Does not file official documents with regulatory authorities
Cannot execute compliance checks on external systems

use_cases.title: DPO Compliance Support
use_cases.description: Guidance on implementing data protection policies, DPO function support, and governance structure establishment.

use_cases.title: Regulatory Compliance Analysis
use_cases.description: GDPR article-by-article compliance verification and regulatory reporting assistance.

use_cases.title: Privacy Technical Implementation
use_cases.description: Technical measures review for data protection by design and default implementation.

prompt_templates.title: Basic GDPR Assessment
prompt_templates.prompt: Conduct a GDPR compliance assessment for our organization. We process customer data for [business purpose]. What are the key GDPR requirements we need to address?

prompt_templates.title: DPIA Framework
prompt_templates.prompt: Help us conduct a Data Protection Impact Assessment for [processing activity]. What factors determine if a DPIA is required and what should it include?

prompt_templates.title: Data Subject Rights
prompt_templates.prompt: Our organization received a data subject access request. Walk us through the proper process for verification, fulfillment, and documentation under GDPR Article 15.

prompt_templates.title: International Transfers
prompt_templates.prompt: We need to transfer personal data to [country]. Evaluate the GDPR Chapter V compliance requirements including adequacy decisions, SCCs, and supplementary measures.

output_examples.input: Help us understand our GDPR compliance obligations for our customer newsletter
output: • Legal Basis: Consent (Art. 6) or Legitimate Interest (must document balancing test)
• Data Collected: Email, name (minimize to necessity)
• Rights: Easy unsubscribe, 30-day erasure request handling
• Documentation: Maintain consent records with timestamp and version
• Privacy Notice: Update to include marketing communication details

best_practices: Maintain comprehensive records of processing activities (Article 30) for all personal data processing
Conduct DPIAs before any high-risk processing activities involving large-scale data or special categories
Establish clear procedures for data subject rights requests with defined timelines and verification steps
anti_patterns: Processing personal data without documenting the legal basis for each processing activity
Collecting more data than necessary and failing to implement data minimization principles
Ignoring international data transfer requirements when using cloud services outside the EU

faq.question: Does this skill replace legal advice for GDPR compliance?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides guidance and recommendations but does not constitute legal advice. Consult qualified legal counsel for official compliance verification.

faq.question: What GDPR articles does this skill cover?
faq.answer: It covers key articles including lawful basis (6), individual rights (13-22), accountability (24-25), DPIA (35), and international transfers (45-49).

faq.question: Can this skill integrate with our existing compliance tools?
faq.answer: The skill provides expertise guidance. Integration requires your team to apply recommendations to your specific tools and systems.

faq.question: Is our data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a prompt-based skill with no network access, file system access, or external data transmission capabilities.

faq.question: Why is our DPIA result showing high risk?
faq.answer: High-risk results indicate processing that requires additional safeguards or supervisory authority consultation under Article 35.

faq.question: How does German DSGVO differ from EU GDPR?
faq.answer: German DSGVO includes national derogations and BDSG integration. This skill addresses both frameworks and their interaction.
